head.title: Judith Allen and Paul Mulkerrin Marry

hedline.hl1: Judith Allen and Paul Mulkerrin Marry

block.p: LEAD: Judith Gibson Allen and Paul Francis Mulkerrin were married yesterday at St. Peter's Episcopal Church in Osterville, Mass. The Rev. Raymond Webster performed the ceremony, assisted by the Rev. John Perry, a Roman Catholic priest.

LEAD: Judith Gibson Allen and Paul Francis Mulkerrin were married yesterday at St. Peter's Episcopal Church in Osterville, Mass. The Rev. Raymond Webster performed the ceremony, assisted by the Rev. John Perry, a Roman Catholic priest.

Judith Gibson Allen and Paul Francis Mulkerrin were married yesterday at St. Peter's Episcopal Church in Osterville, Mass. The Rev. Raymond Webster performed the ceremony, assisted by the Rev. John Perry, a Roman Catholic priest.

Ms. Allen, 33 years old, is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Gordon E. Allen of Osterville. She graduated from Brown University and received an M.B.A. degree from Harvard University. She is a director of national accounts, affiliate relations for the USA cable television network in New York.
The bride's father retired as the president and chief operating officer of Cluett, Peabody & Company, a clothing manufacturer in New York.

Mr. Mulkerrin, 33, is a son of Margaret Mulkerrin of Somerville, Mass., and the late Michael Mulkerrin. He heads Mulkerrin & Company, a financial advisory and investment banking firm in New York. A cum laude graduate of Harvard, he has an M.B.A. from the University of Chicago. His father was employed at W. R. Grace & Company in Cambridge, Mass.
